div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 698 Abdera, Thrace, c. 1850 (3) Burial: c. 460-450 B.C. (T) Contents: 13+ AR Abdera: tetradr. Disposition: London 6; Berlin 1; Boston 1 (all ex Borrell, Sotheby July 12, 1852, nos. 2-14); Prokesch-Osten 5? (NZ 1872, pp. 186-8) May, Abdera, p. 296 (Hoards)
